Default.PoolId: Replace with your Amazon Cognito Identity pool id
Default.Region: Replace with your Amazon Cognito region, eg: us-west-2

Default.PoolId: Replace with your Amazon Cognito User Pool id.
Default.AppClientId: Replace with your Amazon Cognito User Pool App client id.
Default.AppClientSecret: Replace with your Amazon Cognito User Pool App client secret
Default.Region: Replace with your Amazon Cognito region, eg: us-west-2
